column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-04-03 15:01:22+00:00; ;1510633563355496450;en;42;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"Will this work? Yes
column3: if I can make it simple enough to use and then develop the habit of using it every day. Having a dashboard that turns vague relationship expectations into action items with bound context is _hugely_ helpful to me.

column1: But it'll fail if I overengineer it."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-04-03 15:01:21+00:00; ;1510633561241661452;en;48;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;"Which brings me to the final point:

column1: We don't just track these things
column2: we track their current state.

column1: Is your need Satisfied? Unmet? In Crisis?
How many times has this boundary been violated? _How many of those violations were resolved_?
What are your major active triggers?"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-04-03 15:01:21+00:00; ;1510633559429627904;en;52;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"My goal with this
column3: my intention
column4: is to never again have a conversation where one of us desperately tries to communicate a nuanced trigger to the other while navigating a triggered state.

column1: We can understand that mistakes may happen in the moment
column2: but we have a tool to track it."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-04-03 15:01:21+00:00; ;1510633557676466177;en;42;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"6. A space for _structured conversations_

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-22 17:26:21+00:00; ;1506321397538304004;en;10;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;"I learned a lot about this from my partner @ahandvanish

column1: It's all about what data gets collected and what doesn't."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-22 17:25:27+00:00; ;1506321170097967115;en;30;0;3;7;Twitter Web App;"The instinct you need to develop is that data is a liability.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-21 15:13:41+00:00; ;1505925619783188480;en;301;0;2;42;Twitter Web App;"THAT SAID: in our case
column3: there IS a word that is a broad term for people who are not Neurotypical -- that word is ""neurodivergent"".

column1: A _person_ is neurodivergent or not; a _species_ is neurodiverse because it is biodiverse.
Make sense?"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-21 15:13:40+00:00; ;1505925618654978052;en;182;0;2;11;Twitter Web App;"It wouldn't make sense to call a person ""diverse"" if you mean that they are Black or trans or gay or whatever
column3: right? It would sound like a clunky euphemism.

column1: That's what we hear when you call us ""neurodiverse""."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-21 15:13:40+00:00; ;1505925616717160453;en;200;0;2;19;Twitter Web App;Neurodiversity is a subset of Biodiversity. Our brains are parts of our bodies
column3: and if we accept that bodies come in different forms then we accept that brains come in different forms. If we accept that then we accept the implication that subjective experience varies.

column1: Autistics are particularly sensitive to correctness. So."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-10 17:15:25+00:00; ;1501969988411867148;en;191;1;8;5;Twitter Web App;"10 (con't)

column1: The other thing that helped
column2: sort of
column3: was marijuana.

column1: Marijuana has the remarkable ability to cut through a meltdown
column2: to peel back the layers of CPTSD
column3: to create space in my brain so I could respond instead of reacting.

column1: The tradeoff is
column2: I am addicted and do too much."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-10 17:13:40+00:00; ;1501969548320378890;en;221;1;3;9;Twitter Web App;"10 (con't)

column1: The other thing that helped was a frank conversation a friend had with me
column2: who had been through a similar crisis.

column1: He told me: it took you decades to get to this point. You are not going to come out of it in days or months. Give yourself ten years.
It helped a lot."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-10 17:07:21+00:00; ;1501967960520470529;en;185;0;1;8;Twitter Web App;"7) seriously
column3: the concept of ""non-zero days"" was life-changing when I was in this state. I felt _so terrible_ about my lost productivity that it took me a long time to accept that I was disabled.

column1: Accepting that low productivity was better than none made a difference."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-10 14:51:27+00:00; ;1501933759544770567;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;@cararemixed @ButNotTheCity Hyperempathy is also very common in Autistic people
column3: actually. The myth that we don't feel empathy is rooted in the fact that we tend to express empathy differently
column4: and the neurotypical doctors who wrote about us didn't understand it. Highest of ironies.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-03-10 14:48:53+00:00; ;1501933114905432068;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;@cararemixed @ButNotTheCity Yeah
column3: neurotypical people generally don't have to do the amount of metacognition that we do. We have to reverse engineer neurotypical social dynamics from a young age
column4: so we get attuned to all kinds of details and overloaded meanings that they can't see.

column1: But that's just my model of this stuff"

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-02-04 17:37:21+00:00; ;1489654320354185220;en;27;1;0;3;Twitter Web App;"Part of healing for me was learning that I can put up those boundaries anyway
column3: and people can say and do whatever they want as a result -- I don't control them
column4: but _neither am I obligated to make them happy or comfortable_.

column1: Because that's what you learn when you're autistic."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-02-04 17:37:20+00:00; ;1489654319091798023;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;Because if you do people will project the worst shit onto you anyway and then act as if it's true. So you have to constantly engage and constantly ignore your own boundaries just to try to set the record straight
column3: or to explain that you're not looking for a fight
column4: etc.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2022-02-04 17:37:20+00:00; ;1489654317934125056;en;23;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"All of this stuff you just ""absorb"" when other people get to have boundaries but you don't.

column1: And make no mistake: when you are autistic you don't get to have boundaries. You don't get to say ""No I won't explain myself""
column2: you don't get to say ""Back off that's not what I said""
column3: etc."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-23 20:04:50+00:00; ;1474108758863269888;en;18;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"4. Stop looking at the clock or trying predict/quantify my productivity.

column1: Accept that I will have enormously productive weeks and that I will be completely useless in other weeks. This is how my brain works
column2: don't make me pretend otherwise.

column1: Focus on goals
column2: not hours."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-23 20:04:50+00:00; ;1474108757806391300;en;24;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"3. Tell me what you need

There are those among us who are exceptionally kind and patient and perhaps not triggered by these interactions.

column1: So like
column2: how do we get those people in front of the confused and scared parents?"

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-21 01:22:36+00:00; ;1473101563401056258;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"If the goal is to protect the autistic kid then the play has to be to find some way to make the parent let up.

column1: And the way to do that is often to show the parent compassion and allow them space to process complexity that nobody seems to want to acknowledge.
But:"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-21 01:22:35+00:00; ;1473101561790357506;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"This is a hard thing to do
column3: because most often it’s obvious to us when the thing the autistic kid needs protection from is the parent.

column1: And we feel powerless against an authority figure we can’t seem to win against.
And that’s excruciating and *wrong*.
…but what’s the goal?"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-21 01:22:35+00:00; ;1473101559512895496;en;16;0;1;5;Twitter for iPhone;"This. This is the way
column3: we need to focus on the goal.

column1: The goal can’t be to replay our own traumas against other struggling parents
column2: which let’s be real does happen.

column1: This isn’t to excuse abusive parents
column2: quite the contrary!

column1: We want to protect their kids. That has to be the goal. https://t.co/hSxkB6ND6l"

If someone says “I am not disabled” we accept that. But I do think that when a lot of people hear “disability” they hear “pathology” and have a viscerally negative reaction. To me that’s obviously internalized ableism.

Neurotypical people tend to prefer expressions of sympathy — “oh that sounds so hard”
column3: “I’m sorry you had to go through that”
column4: etc.

column1: To us these can feel hollow and unserious
column2: but we learn to do it to make others happy."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-20 03:54:06+00:00; ;1472777303696416769;en;34;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;The one thing I will say with confidence is that when a disabled person and an abled person disagree about disability you should always defer to the disabled one.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-20 03:54:05+00:00; ;1472777300513107975;en;28;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"I know that’s complicated
column3: but disability is complicated. Disability can be visible or invisible
column4: permanent or dynamic
column5: serious or minor. Some people say you’re only disabled if society doesn’t support you - others say nah social support is only one axis.

column1: It’s all true."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-20 03:54:05+00:00; ;1472777297954541571;en;91;1;2;21;Twitter for iPhone;"If someone tells you “I am autistic but I am not disabled” then believe them.

column1: If someone tells you “I am autistic and autism is a disability” then believe them.
The idea that you have to reconcile these claims is reductive and false
column2: and I release you from it."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-20 02:32:19+00:00; ;1472756719889563652;en;47;0;2;6;Twitter for iPhone;And now it’s time for me to watch the CNN autism and weed special. The journalist behind it

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-19 22:57:42+00:00; ;1472702711317598209;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Note

column2: and I do. I am trying to walk a fine line. https://t.co/gyL5XO5cWP"

column1: This is an attempt to transcend my own
column2: to channel it into healing."

column3: or diagnostic equality
column4: doesn't touch _much_ on nonspeakers
column5: etc.

column1: I don't do drafts

column3: but consider this one an eternal draft. I will update over time."

column2: but so often you do -- let me help you
column3: please."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-18 00:03:21+00:00; ;1471994458057158661;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"""Privilege is the freedom to ignore something"" is one of my maxims.

column1: What that means in practice is that I want to create a space that privileges neurodivergent subjectivity over neurotypcal subjectivity.
I want us to feel free to not explain ourselves if we don't cause harm."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-18 00:03:21+00:00; ;1471994456597536773;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Neurodivergent people are used to being talked over
column3: spoken for
column4: misunderstood
column5: misrepresented and ostracized. It's not that y'all are bad people
column6: it's that you do this without realizing it in a million ways every day.

column1: This is a space where we pretend it's the opposite."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-18 00:03:21+00:00; ;1471994455204974592;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"This space is a resource: this is about support. Specifically
column3: this is about supporting each other as we navigate life through these complex lenses.

column1: I want to see us lift each other up. I want to see us hold each other accountable while validating each others experiences."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-18 00:03:20+00:00; ;1471994453741215744;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"I will likely add moderators soon
column3: but let's not talk about that yet.

column1: I believe in tolerance as an active process
column2: and I believe that intolerance must not be tolerated. There is no contradiction there
column3: and I will not be taking questions on this at this time."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD

column1: I can and will ask people to delete tweets that feel harmful to me."

column3: even when we are angry or critical. Save the ranting for the public timeline

column5: try to bring your A-Game -- the version of you who can read generously and write kindly.

column1: I think we can expect constant person-first language

column1: But I also believe that Doctor Gupta wants to learn."

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:33:17+00:00; ;1471986888420507650;en;63;0;4;17;Twitter for iPhone;"If you have asymptomatic or mild covid your chance of getting long Covid doesn’t go down.

column1: If you have asymptomatic or mild Covid you are still contagious and pose a risk to people around you.
Don’t be like Ben. The economy needs you more than you need it. Prioritize health. https://t.co/Z0ShCLTC7P"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:19:25+00:00; ;1471983401947349001;en;77;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;"This is the correct take. I am exploring
column3: in this thread
column4: the idea that maybe one particular pathological experience in Autistic life is pre-verbal Burnout. But I shouldn't be rampantly speculating that ""this solves everything!"" I know better.

column1: Thanks!
https://t.co/G2PsSDLRAp"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:17:20+00:00; ;1471982877365710854;en;24;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;@stevesilberman @epballou Yeah
column3: upon more reflection I realize that I am being way
column4: way more reductive here than I intend. I agree with everything you're saying. I got excited and tweeted late last night after two really longs days and now I have a lot of nuance to inject back into this model.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:15:42+00:00; ;1471982464147107840;en;137;0;10;3;Twitter Web App;"This was a short call
column3: and it was impossible to cover the many
column4: many things that needed to be said. I didn't get into diagnosis
column5: or gendered presentation
column7: or any of a number of really important topics.

column1: But I hope that this started a process."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:27+00:00; ;1471981898570346505;en;120;0;1;3;Twitter Web App;But
column3: as I said
column4: the conversation ended with him requesting my thoughts about his special and saying he'd read some links I sent him. So I'm cautiously hopeful that today's forays into twitter opened the door to a powerful new ally in the fight for neurodivergent thriving.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:27+00:00; ;1471981897043566602;en;143;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;"And through this Doctor Gupta listened to me gush
column3: asked incisive questions and clearly understood the points I was making.

column1: What I'm not sure he realizes is just how rare this opportunity was
column2: and how _nobody_ talks about this on the world stage."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:26+00:00; ;1471981895617593346;en;103;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;I talked about a twitter friend who I know sometimes hits themselves in the head (in ways that are controlled
column3: purposeful
column4: and help them avoid migraines and meltdowns) and how this isn't irrational behavior
column5: but how my friend may have needed to learn how to do it harmlessly.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:26+00:00; ;1471981894136967170;en;119;1;2;4;Twitter Web App;"Finally
column3: he asked me about self-injurious behaviors and how we should talk and reason about those. Aren't those an example of ""severe"" autism?

column1: This led to a conversation about how all behavior is motivated. There's no such thing as random irrational behavior
column2: just misunderstood."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:25+00:00; ;1471981892635443201;en;111;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;"We talked about how e.g. Epilepsy is commonly comorbid with Autism
column3: and about how Epileptic traits don't make an Autistic person ""more autistic"". Etc.

column1: And so the category of ""severe"" autism sort of breaks down. I told him about @TheLancet's latest stuff re: ""profound"" autism."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:25+00:00; ;1471981891154849796;en;112;0;2;3;Twitter Web App;"Then he asked me how to reason about ""severe"" autism
column3: and I was really grateful for the question. We talked about how something like 50% of autistic people have a comorbid intellectual disability
column4: for instance
column5: and about how that comorbidity is not ""more autistic""."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:25+00:00; ;1471981889699422214;en;183;1;1;17;Twitter Web App;"So I explained how when a parent says ""I don't want my kid to be defined by their autism""
column3: what the kid actually experiences is ""I don't want to acknowledge aspects of my kid's identity"" and how that can be really harmful to us.

column1: He grokked it immediately."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:24+00:00; ;1471981888256552961;en;118;0;3;5;Twitter Web App;"As a result
column3: ""Autistic Person"" is strongly preferred over ""Person with Autism"" by Autistic People. That non-autistic people feel otherwise should come as no surprise
column4: I explained -  remember Autism Speaks used to preach ""love the child
column5: hate the autism"" etc?

column1: PARENTS want PFL."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:24+00:00; ;1471981886398476292;en;107;2;2;7;Twitter Web App;"If Autism were a disease
column3: I pointed out
column4: then IFL would probably be appropriate. But as we are increasingly coming to understand
column5: Autism is perhaps best understood as a neurotype.

column1: It's a specific configuration of neurological traits.
And it informs every aspect of our identity."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:24+00:00; ;1471981884750053378;en;105;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;"He acknowledged (this never happens!!!!) that he may have to be educated on this point
column3: and asked me for my perspective.

column1: I said: first
column2: every individual gets to choose their preference. Second
column3: most Autistic adults strongly prefer IFL because our Autism is not a disease."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:13:23+00:00; ;1471981883101782018;en;90;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"We talked about PFL vs IFL
column3: and he explained that his choice to use PFL was motivated by his own life experiences and from listening to people with a different condition explain to him how important ""Person First"" language was to them. This made me understand he cared."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 23:02:25+00:00; ;1471979123086139398;en;94;0;1;5;Twitter Web App;Also
column3: in the interest of public accountability (because that's how I like to do things!) I'd like to share with you all the perspectives I shared with Doctor Gupta. I'm just one person doing my best to represent a movement in a few minutes
column4: so correct me if I got anything wrong:

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:59:53+00:00; ;1471978486428581893;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;"@echinorlax lol ""get your hot fresh artisanal autistic experience right here
column3: get it while it's hot
column4: get it while it's awkward!"""

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:33:56+00:00; ;1471971956077514752;en;137;3;13;15;Twitter Web App;"One last thing
column3: I'm going to compile a short list of reading material to email Doctor Gupta so that he can get exposed to voices other than mine.

column1: If you could ask CNN's chief medical correspondent to read one thing
column2: what would it be?"

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:33:56+00:00; ;1471971954567622656;en;157;2;1;8;Twitter Web App;So I hope we can as a community grant Doctor Gupta a bit of grace if we choose to watch his special
column3: and understand that he's not only doing his best to help (which can still cause harm!) but is also listening to Autistic adults when feedback is offered.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:33:56+00:00; ;1471971952629886984;en;182;0;2;5;Twitter Web App;But when I reached out
column3: as a random person on the internet
column4: to offer some earnest feedback? Doctor Gupta replied
column5: and we had a very pleasant phone call where we talked about this stuff and he made clear that he wants to learn from Autistic people.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:29:01+00:00; ;1471970715662491658;en;152;0;1;6;Twitter Web App;"On a related note
column3: I'm eager to see this CNN special on Sunday from @drsanjaygupta.

column1: I'm going to be honest: a lot of Autistic people will be frustrated with some of this framing and with some of the language choices.
https://t.co/DnyYHpq4iu"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:24:14+00:00; ;1471969514497757186;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;@sophsutcliffe77 @Saraheboon Same tag me in!

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:23:04+00:00; ;1471969219063472132;en;229;0;1;9;Twitter Web App;"(Do you know how never that happens?

column1: How often non-autistic professionals are asked about us and the conversation stops there?
Do you know how good it felt to explain this stuff to someone who wants to do better and is in a position to even passively enact change by learning?)"

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 22:23:03+00:00; ;1471969216769277959;en;650;14;9;46;Twitter Web App;"I just had a conversation with a major media figure where they asked me to help them understand how Autistic people feel about things like person-first language
column3: ""severe"" autism and self-injurious behavior.

column1: Then they really listened and seemed to hear me.
Wow."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:55:31+00:00; ;1471962287015661594;en;44;0;4;0;Twitter Web App;"TFW a public figure wants to earnestly hear your feedback about how they represent Autism on national TV and then they can't get ahold of you because you set your phone to mute calls from unknown numbers and forgot to unset it.

column1: Sorry about that
column2: Doc
column3: I fixed it!😅"

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:43+00:00; ;1471961078494109703;en;10;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"If you're in that situation
column3: you still have to make the choice -- but here's a bit of evidence
column4: and I hope it helps you.

column1: You can and will find integration if you keep working towards it
column2: honoring the exiled parts and allowing them to do their job by building a stronger self."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:42+00:00; ;1471961075746840578;en;11;0;2;0;Twitter Web App;So
column3: to wrap up what turned into a pretty rambling thread
column4: I hope this helps some people. I know three years ago I had to _choose to believe_ that healing was possible
column5: against three and a half decades of evidence. It was a choice based on faith

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:42+00:00; ;1471961073255333890;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;Today I have a self that can appreciate and love the part of me that is experiencing a negative emotional response and I can acknowledge and comfort that part. I don't need to externalize that parts needs into my outer behavior unless that becomes necessary in order to meet them.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:41+00:00; ;1471961068998205454;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Three years ago the negative feeling would have dominated my thoughts and behaviors. I didn't have a ""self"" that could handle it
column3: and so my self would have abdicated control to the feeling. Gave the car keys to the mailman and hid under the table."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:40+00:00; ;1471961067127517187;en;10;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;In holding conflicting emotional complexity while understanding that I was making decisions from a self informed by a much larger context I proved to myself just how far I've come through three years of doing IFS therapy and putting in the work.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:40+00:00; ;1471961064808009736;en;12;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;And then
column3: another feeling came in that was pure gratitude for some grace I have received in life in a way that was related to the strong negative emotion. And instead of fighting the two strong feelings just both existed for a bit
column4: delivered their messages
column5: and moved on.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:39+00:00; ;1471961062283091969;en;10;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;ALL of which is to say
column3: therapy was good yesterday because I was talking about a thing where I had a very strong negative reaction. But while holding that feeling and embracing the part of myself that was feeling it I was also able to hold on to my self.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:39+00:00; ;1471961060001337355;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"If you struggle with emotional dysregulation one way to think about that is to understand that some of your exiled parts are sending messages with HUGE payloads marked URGENT
column3: and you don't understand how to deal with that.

column1: But you can learn!"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:38+00:00; ;1471961057430282247;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"ALL of which is to say
column3: the goal of IFS is to identify these breakdowns and heal them by teaching the self how to receive and process the messages from those parts in a healthy way.

column1: Not ""ignore this part"" not ""abdicate control to this part""
column2: but ""hear this part."""

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:37+00:00; ;1471961055458902016;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"We want to fix the problem NOT by successfully excising the exiled parts from our selves but by recognizing and honoring the intention and intense labor of those parts.

column1: They wear themselves out trying to do their jobs
column2: and because our self isn't processing correctly they can't."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:37+00:00; ;1471961053491875846;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;(Note that there are lots of reasons to exile parts of yourself -- maybe you are ashamed of what some emotion is telling you
column3: maybe you are afraid of some truth you don't want to acknowledge
column4: maybe you are traumatized into reactivity
column5: etc)

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:37+00:00; ;1471961051314937859;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"It does this by first recognizing what's happening. ""Oh! Here is a part of you that is trying to communicate with your self but your self is unable to process what it has to say.""

column1: We call those parts ""exiles"" because they are ""exiled"" from the integrated self."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:36+00:00; ;1471961048722939905;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"So
column3: that hurt that we all share
column4: that's a wound to the self. It makes the self unable to correctly and efficiently interpret and process certain messages.

column1: And the goal of IFS therapy is to identify the places where that breaks down and heal them."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:35+00:00; ;1471961046499962880;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Once you start to understand and frame trauma this way you realize that most toxic behavior in the world comes from the same place: peoples' various inner children acting out old wounds and trying to heal but not knowing how.

column1: It becomes hard not to see people as hurt children."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:35+00:00; ;1471961044272754689;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"That's why
column3: when you get triggered
column4: you may find yourself reacting in ways that have nothing to do with ""who you are"". Your ""self"" is being overwritten
column5: often by a childhood part that experienced an extreme overload of emotional signal.

column1: We literally act like hurt children."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:34+00:00; ;1471961042133659648;en;11;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;But that's exactly what can happen. Trauma in particular can be thought about as an acquired malfunction in the self's ability to efficiently and accurately process incoming information. Trauma makes us drop everything when certain kinds of messages come in.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:34+00:00; ;1471961039885545472;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;So in IFS terms
column3: you need a strong sense of self to receive messages from senses and then make decisions based on those messages. But it would be a really crappy coordinating part if its response to every message was to drop everything and do what that message said
column4: right?

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:33+00:00; ;1471961037503090693;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"The ""self"" is a special part whose job it is to coordinate feedback between all the other parts. Senses let the self know about changes in the external world (the five senses you probably think of) or in the internal world (we call these emotions)."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:33+00:00; ;1471961035133362182;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"But -- if the senses are messengers letting the receiver know that something changed
column3: who exactly is that receiver?

column1: That's a philosophical question so we could spend all day there but I'm going to cut to the end of the book and say that IFS models the ""self"" as the receiver."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:32+00:00; ;1471961032650379276;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"The thing is
column3: that's not what emotions are designed to do. Emotions are senses - they detect changes in state and make a feeling in your body to tell you about it.

column1: That's what senses do
column2: that's their function."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 21:50:31+00:00; ;1471961030280503311;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"In IFS Therapy terms this meant that I had an under developed sense of ""self"". The ""part"" that felt the strong emotion would easily overwhelm the ""self"" and take control of my cognition and behavior.

column1: I was
column2: in short
column3: relinquishing responsibility for my actions to my emotions."

column1: It's not ableist or problematic to acknowledge the need for 24/7 support. But to call that ""low functioning"" has a ton of baggage that we can put down."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 18:28:21+00:00; ;1471910150873268230;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Further
column3: ""functioning level"" can and does fluctuate over time. My ""functioning"" when I'm hyper focusing on a problem that I need to solve is very different from my ""functioning"" in a Burnout state. Both are me
column4: neither defines me."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 07:25:15+00:00; ;1471743277313531905;en;22;0;0;3;Twitter for iPhone;"The more I think about this the more it feels right.

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 07:12:56+00:00; ;1471740177911631873;en;7;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"What I’m musing about - musing

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-17 07:07:13+00:00; ;1471738736807493636;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@autistictic Sorry

column4: because there are consistently a small number of people not just wrong but CONFIDENTLY wrong.

column3: figure out what's a story your body is telling you and what's a story the world is telling you

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-15 14:51:30+00:00; ;1471130803421786118;en;109;1;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;"A lot of autistic people think that they are

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-11 19:31:54+00:00; ;1469751818133688325;en;9;0;0;1;Twitter Web App;So

Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-11 19:31:54+00:00; ;1469751815096971273;en;6;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"Both the inner critic AND a healthy growth part can tell you things that cause you to feel shame.

column1: That's why it's so important to learn how to process shame appropriately -- because when used correctly it's a tool for growth. But it can also be toxic."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-11 19:31:53+00:00; ;1469751813574377482;en;8;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"Self-awareness
column3: on the other hand
column4: can ALSO make you feel really bad -- but if you listen to what the part is saying
column5: you'll realize it's not trying to put you down. It's trying to build you up.

column1: A growth part is protecting you by helping to identify ways to get stronger."

For years mine sounded like my father
column3: and it actively harmed my relationship with him in ways that haven't fully recovered.

column1: I blamed him for what that voice was telling me.
The inner critic _puts you down_."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD

column1: This way nobody else can hurt you more
column2: right? If they don't like your art who cares
column3: you already ""know"" it's crap."

column4: that sucks and the truth is that it's not a particularly rare story.

column1: In this case

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 16:56:32+00:00; ;1468987940198133770;en;18;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@vaneharriet @ekverstania First
column3: I isolate. “I’m sorry
column4: I need a minute.”

column1: Second
column2: box breathing. Inhale for 6
column3: hold for 6
column4: exhale for 6
column5: hold for 6
column6: repeat until nervous system calms down.

column1: As I’m doing that I remind myself that my negative thoughts are not necessarily a reliable indicator of reality."

column1: But what it does is provide a safe and productive frame through which I can engage with this stuff. It's not just raw terror anymore -- it's an exhibit."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 16:38:51+00:00; ;1468983490502959115;en;39;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"And like that

column1: I can _put_ things here."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 16:38:50+00:00; ;1468983487436894215;en;26;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"And I started talking about the sadness and anger it brought up

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:41:45+00:00; ;1468818125911207939;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@dukejamdogmom I hear that
column3: and I’m sorry for the tone of some of my arguments earlier. It isn’t my intention to erase adhd struggles at all. I have them too!

column1: But there IS a thing here to discuss
column2: and just because it’s hard to talk about doesn’t mean we shouldn’t try I think."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:40:34+00:00; ;1468817831466881024;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@dukejamdogmom Agreed with that. But anti-autistic stigma is real and serious in a way that adhd stigma isn’t. ADHD has a huge uphill battle for legitimacy and acceptance
column3: don’t get me wrong. But nobody looks at you like a school shooter if you say you’re adhd.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:13+00:00; ;1468814971693895684;en;17;0;0;1;Twitter Web App;"So I dunno. I stirred the pot a lot today
column3: and I'm not crazy about stirring it some more here
column4: but I guess I still had things to say.

column1: When you tell someone you're ADHD they don't look at you like a school shooter. When you say you're autistic they do. That matters."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:12+00:00; ;1468814970347528195;en;9;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"Now
column3: the mistake I made earlier was to accuse people with ADHD diagnosis talking about their traits of being the ones that appropriated our space.

column1: They didn't
column2: they never did that. Not intentionally
column3: not most of them.

column1: But their diagnosticians did. And the space is still taken."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:12+00:00; ;1468814969059921921;en;11;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"I absolutely believe that issues with sensory overload
column3: parsing social interactions and eye contact show up in ADHD people.

column1: Because you know what else shows up really often in ADHD people?
Autism."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:12+00:00; ;1468814967868739589;en;7;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"We have to acknowledge that
column3: and people saying ""Well you're erasing ADHD too!"" is failing to acknowledge that on some level that it's appropriate for us to reclaim space that was ours and has been appropriated."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:11+00:00; ;1468814966601961477;en;9;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"I get that it may hurt
column3: if you're ADHD and not autistic
column4: to see someone arguing that what you're describing is actually autism. And as I said earlier
column5: I regret that some of my tweets went down that road.

column1: But I don't want to equivocate: there _is_ a privilege differential
column2: here."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:11+00:00; ;1468814965150785538;en;14;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"I know ADHD is hard. I have ADHD as well as autism. I know it comes with a slew of challenges that make life really difficult.

column1: But having the entire global social order committed to dehumanizing you is simply not one of those challenges. And that matters."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:11+00:00; ;1468814963829612546;en;11;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;When you're ADHD do you think about these things? Do you worry that confessing your ADHD to a medical professional may somehow lead to the loss of your freedom or agency? Do you watch
column3: when you disclose to loved ones
column4: as they treat you as less-than?

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:10+00:00; ;1468814962495823875;en;41;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;"We do.

column1: When I go to the doctor I look at their age and gender and race
column2: and if they're a white man over 40 I don't tell them I'm autistic.

column1: Either they won't believe me and start treating me as unreliable
column2: or worse they will believe me and treat me as a liability to myself."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:10+00:00; ;1468814961183006726;en;20;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"ADHD people don't have decades of medical ""expertise"" saying they don't feel empathy
column3: saying they can't love
column4: saying they aren't really a person just the shape of a person
column5: saying they're somewhere between a robot and a chimpanzee. (Thanks Stephen Pinker for that last one!)"

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:10+00:00; ;1468814959853416456;en;6;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;"If an autistic person erases ADHD to assert the existence of Autism that's not great. There are better ways to frame the argument
column3: and erasing people is never okay.

column1: But it's not _as bad_
column2: in meaningful and important ways
column3: as people erasing autism."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-09 05:29:09+00:00; ;1468814958083420163;en;19;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"This. Yes
column3: sometimes we get a bit upset with erasure and yes we can be guilty of erasing ADHD as we assert Autism.

column1: But it's not the same. The playing field is not level. Autistic people are systemically dehumanized and disenfranchised in a way that ADHD people simply are not. https://t.co/4xxubAYH3X"

column2: no

column1: I don't mean to say ""That's not ADHD"".

column2: ""That may also be autism
column3: and it's important to know that."""

column2: including things like trouble with eye contact and social problems.

column1: And by just saying ""that's autism"" I am guilty of erasing ADHD."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 18:29:01+00:00; ;1468648827305578499;en;32;0;1;3;Twitter Web App;"The position I hold

column2: that would be inappropriate."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 16:39:06+00:00; ;1468621165207986178;en;290;4;8;24;Twitter Web App;"Anyway
column3: the reason I bring this up is that there has not
column4: to my knowledge
column5: been a similar ""ADHD Supremacy"" movement. Yet.

column1: But I see hints of it. I see tiktokers talking about ADHD as a superpower
column2: how having ADHD makes you smarter than NT people etc."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 16:39:05+00:00; ;1468621163429568512;en;247;1;3;19;Twitter Web App;"Long story short
column3: there was a culture war and the supremacists lost. The diagnosis went away and got rolled into ""Autism""
column4: at least here in the US. Now you are just ""Autistic"" or not.

column1: Some people want to hold on to ""Aspie"" as a form of supremacy
column2: but they're confederate statues."

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 16:39:05+00:00; ;1468621161550565377;en;235;0;5;11;Twitter Web App;"They really bought into the ""superpower"" line
column3: and talked about themselves as the next phase of human evolution and all of this other garbage.

column1: Allistics were ""too emotional""

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 16:39:04+00:00; ;1468621159302410247;en;213;2;4;16;Twitter Web App;"This led to the emergence of a thing we now refer to
column3: disparagingly
column4: as ""Aspie Supremacy"". Basically people with Asperger's Syndrome started to get it into their heads that they were superior -- not only to delayed-speech autistics but also to allistic people."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-08 16:29:52+00:00; ;1468618841815138305;en;172;0;4;14;Twitter Web App;"To all the ADHD advocates out there

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:24:25+00:00; ;1468345678778843139;en;32;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"No game or show holds my attention
column3: and forget books.

column1: This is like when I lost my shame
column2: in a way
column3: except instead of interfering with work and obligation it interferes with leisure.

column1: Huh."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:24:24+00:00; ;1468345677382103040;en;29;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Where I’m at now is that weed withdrawal has me 100% anhedonic. I just logged a ten hour work day because it was at least something to do.

column1: And I’m recognizing the same shape. A motivator has been lost. I used to smoke and then enjoy doing stuff. Without smoking I can’t sit still"
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:21:29+00:00; ;1468344944242925573;en;41;1;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"But you heal your trauma
column3: you learn that the fear and dread and anxiety are things you don’t have to hold.

column1: But removing the monster won’t let the scared little kid come back out. You gotta go get him
column2: coax him out
column3: convince him he’s safe. He won’t believe you at first. It’s work"

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:21:29+00:00; ;1468344942959415296;en;52;1;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"Trauma teaches us not to exist. It replaces joy with fear
column3: anticipation with dread
column4: excitement with anxiety.

column1: It takes your ability to play from you because play is for safe people and you are not safe.
It teaches you to run
column2: RUN! NOW! DON’T STOP!

column1: The kid under it goes away."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:16:43+00:00; ;1468343742495174668;en;35;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"But time and slowness and time and patience and time and reflection and time and therapy have helped me to come to know who I am in the absence of that fear and shame.

column1: This person always existed
column2: it’s just that his goals never mattered. Now they do."

There really was a good while where I could work on maybe a ticket per day and I’d hang up my hat the instant I achieved more than zero.

column1: Between the broken motivator and the autistic burnout I had very little to offer."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:16:42+00:00; ;1468343739722739719;en;38;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;Since then it’s been about building up positive motivation. I do things where I will be satisfied by the process of doing them. I’ve rearranged my work life to let me focus on the things I enjoy and am good at
column3: and I am now motivated by achieving goals and delighting others.

column1: 5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:16:42+00:00; ;1468343738766405633;en;45;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"Which
column3: great!

column1: Until I realized that not even I can make me do anything
column2: because my whole productivity engine had been driven by external motivation and consequence avoidance and I was no longer afraid.

column1: My employer at that time did not get my best work."
5614412;mykola;🇺🇦 sunflower seeds 🌻;Digital Tummeler. Autistic and ADHD
column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. My whole bearing changed. The way I walk and stand changed. I wasn’t ashamed to take up space anymore. This world was as much mine as anyone else’s.

column1: And: nobody can make me do anything."

column2: DevExp Software Engineer. Post-Discordian. Black Trans Lives Matter. Probably should give some of that #landback. Grace.;113030;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-12-07 22:16:42+00:00; ;1468343736782499848;en;37;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;I’ve told the story of dropping my shame on here a few times
